articles.title: Alberta government to start charging residents for COVID-19 shots this fall
articles.description: EDMONTON — Alberta's government announced Friday residents who are not immunocompromised or on social programs will soon have to pay to get the COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content:
EDMONTON — Alberta's government announced Friday residents who are not immunocompromised or on social programs will soon have to pay to get the COVID-19 vaccine.

articles.title: Iran’s top military commanders, 6 nuclear scientists among 78 killed in Israeli strikes
articles.description: RIYADH: Iran’s Supreme Leader Khamenei confirmed on Friday that several military commanders and scientists were “martyred” in Israeli strikes on Tehran. In a statement carried on state television, Khamenei warned that Israel will not go unpunished for its attacks. “We will not allow them to escape safely from this great crime they committed,” Khamenei said in a recorded
articles.content:
Trump says Iran has ‘second chance’ to come to nuclear deal after Israeli strikes devastate Tehran

articles.title: South American Mastodons Regularly Consumed Fruits, Study Suggests
articles.description: Most megafaunal herbivores in the Americas went extinct around 10,000 years ago, presumably disrupting the long-distance seed dispersal of large, fleshy-fruited plant species.

articles.title: Markram and Bavuma steer South Africa to verge of stunning WTC upset against Australia
articles.description: A brilliant unbeaten partnership between Aiden Markram and an injured Temba Bavuma has taken South Africa to within 69 runs of World Test Championship glory
